entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Note, another burst of northwest gales is likely to affect Wellington late Sunday and early Monday, and another Watch may be issued closer to the time. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds about the High Country have eased this morning. However, another burst of strong northwesterly winds is expected to affect the High Country and foothills of the Canterbury Plains later on Sunday. These northwesterlies may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.
